title: Robert Dilts - Tools For Dreamers: Strategies for Creativity and
description:
English | Mp3 | 108 min | 120kbps | 48000hz | 2 channel | 342Mb

Audio recording taken from a live seminar of Robert Dilts on Tools for Dreamers NLP.In here, Robert Dilts presented the principles and methods of Tools for Dreamers he has written earlier. Two important aspects of resources are presented, the strategies of creativity and the structure of innovation.Here's a description of the book of the same title:NLP provides a set of tools that allows us to take major steps toward overcoming limitations. The NLP modeling process involves finding out how the brain operates by nalyzing language patterns and nonverbal communication. The results of this annalysis become part of the step by step strategies or programs that may be used to transfer skills to other people and applications.
NLP provides a way to look past the behavioral content of what people do, to the forces behind those behaviors to the stuctures of thought that allow people to perform effectively. NLP provides a framework and a languarge that model the relevant mental strategies used by creative people so that those processes can be communicatied, stimulated and managed in a systematic way. This book examines the structure and principles of creativity to enhance the creativity and productivity of individuals, teams and organizations.
